Dear Hagop,

 

Your PAR-BI & TPL insurance is due to expire on 23 September 2025.  We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease. 

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards

 

Alya Al Ameeri

​​​​

Ethics & Compliance Executive

From: Alya Al Ameeri <AAlameeri@amrc.ae> 
Sent: Tuesday, 24 September 2024 7:44 AM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Rebecca Lane <RLane@amrc.ae>; Connie Madeira <Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>; Grace Milan <Grace.Milan@chalhoub.com>; MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com
Subject: RE: Chalhoub Group - MaxMara, Carolina Hererra, Tory Burch, Christian Louboutin, The Galleria Al Maryah Island - PAR-BI & TPL insurance Renewal First Reminder 

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Your PAR & TPL insurance expired on 23 September 2024 and we note that we have yet to receive renewed compliant insurance in respect of the above.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance is as follows:

 

Property All Risk and Business Interruption Expired 23 September2024

Third Party Liability Expired 23 September 2024

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.

From: Alya Al Ameeri <AAlameeri@amrc.ae <mailto:AAlameeri@amrc.ae> > 
Sent: Friday, 13 September 2024 8:35 AM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Rebecca Lane <RLane@amrc.ae <mailto:RLane@amrc.ae> >; Connie Madeira <Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com> >; Grace Milan <Grace.Milan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Grace.Milan@chalhoub.com> >; MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com> 
Subject: Chalhoub Group - MaxMara, Carolina Hererra, Tory Burch, Christian Louboutin, The Galleria Al Maryah Island - PAR-BI & TPL insurance Renewal

 

Dear Hagop,

 

Your PAR-BI & TPL insurance is due to expire on 23 September 2024.  We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease. 

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

Ethics & Compliance Executive
